subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent loan request, we are ready to lend money
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
$484,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest entire payment!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this plain form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://xysidge.com/
